title: [Large-scale] Data Structures Mastery: Mobile-Based Intensive Short-Term Course

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic programming and algorithmic concepts
context.additional_context: Core data structure concept education conducted on a flexible schedule utilizing mobile devices and an LMS

learning_goals: Learners can compare the time and space complexity of major data structures (arrays, linked lists, stacks, queues, trees, graphs).
Learners can select and implement appropriate data structures by analyzing real-world cases.
Learners can confirm achieving 80% or more of their learning outcomes through peer assessment.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
